thread.title: In break with White House, Clinton advocates Syria no-fly zone
thread.title_full: In break with White House, Clinton advocates Syria no-fly zone - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: In break with White House, Clinton advocates Syria no-fly zone
text: Former secretary of state Hillary Rodham Clinton broke with the White House she used to serve by advocating additional international air power to protect civilians in the multi-front war in Syria. “I personally would be advocating now for a no-fly zone and humanitarian corridors to try to stop the carnage on the ground and from […] ...
